comment: There aren't multiple Jewish religions. There is Judaism and there is everything else.
amr:
# ::snt There aren't multiple Jewish religions. There is Judaism and there is everything else.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / religion
            :polarity -
            :mod (r2 / religious-group
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Jew"))
            :quant (m2 / multiple))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 r2
            :op2 (e / everything
                  :mod (e2 / else))))

comment: Hi there, xenophobic and racist slurs are offensive and hurtful and should not be used. Please refrain from these types of comments.

            :ARG1 (h / hi)
            :ARG2 (t / there))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (o / offend-01
                  :ARG0 (s2 / slur
                        :mod (x / xenophobe)
                        :mod (r / racist)))
